title: Public Domain Sample Library
description: Curated public-domain samples for Groovebox playback testing.

samples.name: Loch Ness Bass Pulse
samples.description: Classic bass pulse useful for techno and bass-driven kits.

samples.name: Typewriter Chatter
samples.description: Percussive clicks and transitions that layer with ambient kits.

samples.name: Relaxing Harp Plucks
samples.description: Organic plucks ready for pads or melodic clips.

samples.name: 808 Drum & One-Shots Pack
samples.description: TR-808 inspired bass, snare, hat, and clap hits you can layer.

samples.name: Free 808 WAV One-Shots
samples.description: 88 clean 808 one-shots polished for modern kits.

samples.name: BandLab Free 808 Collection
samples.description: Loops and hits from the BandLab catalog for TR-808 grooves.

samples.name: 909 Drum Machine Pack
samples.description: TR-909 kick, hats, crash, and percussion hits.

samples.name: Free 909 Tag Page
samples.description: Assorted free 909 packs and links for expanded kits.

samples.name: Raveyard Freebie Bunker
samples.description: Hard dance and techno kits with stabs.

samples.name: MagneticMag Free House Sample Packs
samples.description: Curated house/sample pack list with loops, drums, and one-shots.

samples.name: Electro/House SampleFocus Collection
samples.description: Electro-house melodic one-shots, basslines, and loops.
